description.fr: Lorsque vous jouez le sort {Spell:164202}\_:\v Inflige {value:pc,percent} de l'{%AT} de votre héros autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui.
description.en: When you play the {Spell:164202} spell:\v Inflicts {value:pc,percent} of your hero's {%AT} around <sprite name="cell_around"> them.
description.es: Cuando lanzas el hechizo {Spell:164202}:\v Inflige un {value:pc,percent} del {%AT} de tu héroe a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de: Wenn du den Zauber {Spell:164202} ausspielst:\v Verursacht {value:pc,percent} des {%AT} deines Helden ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> als Schaden.
description.pt: Ao lançar o feitiço {Spell:164202}:\v Inflige {value:pc,percent} do {%AT} do seu herói em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
